articles.title: Ryder Cup: USA lead Europe 11-5 before singles on final day – live! - The Guardian
articles.description: Rolling report: Will Europe pull off a spectacular comeback in the singles on the final day at Whistling Straits? Join Scott Murray

articles.author: Nick Pietruszkiewicz
articles.title: Bryson DeChambeau and his driver were at it again at the Ryder Cup - ESPN
articles.description: Bryson DeChambeau pounded a 354-yard drive that flew onto the green -- on a par-4 -- on Sunday at the Ryder Cup. He then rolled in the eagle putt against Europe's Sergio Garcia.
articles.content:
It took a grand total of one swing -- his very first of the day -- for Bryson DeChambeau to take over Sunday at the Ryder Cup.
In his singles match against Europe's Sergio Garcia, DeChambeau grabbed… [+921 chars]
